SELECT sd.depart_name, patrol_task_organization.* FROM patrol_task_organization patrol_task_organization JOIN sys_depart sd ON patrol_task_organization.org_code = sd.org_code WHERE patrol_task_organization.del_flag = 0 AND sd.del_flag = 0
AND patrol_task_organization.task_code =#{taskCode}

SELECT DISTINCT pto.org_code FROM patrol_task_organization pto WHERE pto.del_flag = 0 AND pto.org_code IS NOT NULL
AND pto.task_code = #{taskCode}

SELECT DISTINCT pto.org_code as orgCode, sd.depart_name orgName FROM patrol_task_organization pto JOIN sys_depart sd ON pto.org_code = sd.org_code AND sd.del_flag = 0 WHERE pto.del_flag = 0
AND pto.task_code = #{taskCode}
select distinct task_code from patrol_task_organization where del_flag = 0

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sd.depart_name) FROM patrol_task_organization p JOIN sys_depart sd ON p.org_code = sd.org_code WHERE p.del_flag = 0 AND sd.del_flag = 0
AND p.task_code in
#{item}
order by sd.org_code
